ch0269_00_ayumi/7101_0701_01_10:
No matter how far your destination is, just keep
walking and you’ll definitely find your way!
ch0269_00_ayumi/7101_0701_02_10:
I hope to venture out and reach the ends of the
world one day!
ch0269_00_ayumi/7102_0701_02_10:
Yup, it’s the same town that Red and Blue
are from!
ch0269_00_ayumi/7102_0701_03_10: I need to work harder so I can reach their level!
ch0269_00_ayumi/7103_0701_01_10:
There are Trainers and Pokémon from all kinds of
regions on Pasio.
ch0269_00_ayumi/7103_0701_02_10:
So it’s hard to decide who I want to battle
every day!
ch0269_00_ayumi/7104_0701_01_10: Do you play a lot with your Pokémon?
ch0269_00_ayumi/7104_0701_02_10:
They’re not with you just to battle, so make sure to
show them lots of affection!
ch0269_00_ayumi/7105_0701_02_10:
See these amazing Candies? If you give them to
your Pokémon, good things might happen!
ch0269_00_ayumi/7105_0701_03_10:
Oh, wait... I’m sorry, looks like I’m out of Candies
right now.
ch0269_00_ayumi/1701_0702_01_10:
I’m sure it’ll come in handy for you and
your Pokémon!
ch0269_00_ayumi/2501_0701_01_10:
Do you know about the Master Trainers,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0269_00_ayumi/2501_0701_02_10:
They’re highly skilled Trainers who have focused
on training one species of Pokémon!
ch0269_00_ayumi/2501_0701_03_10:
What kind of Pokémon do you want to be a
Master Trainer of?
ch0269_00_ayumi/2501_0702_01_10:
It’s important to have a strong bond with your
Pokémon if you want to become a Master Trainer.
ch0269_00_ayumi/2501_0702_02_10:
So make sure to battle and play with your
Pokémon a lot!
ch0269_00_ayumi/2501_0702_03_10:
Ahh... I want to become a Master Trainer one
day, too!
ch0269_00_ayumi/2511_0701_01_10:
Since I got to Pasio, I’ve had more things to learn
than ever!
ch0269_00_ayumi/2511_0701_02_10: Meeting new Pokémon and battling new Trainers...
ch0269_00_ayumi/2511_0701_03_10:
It’s been a blast encountering something new
every day!
ch0269_00_ayumi/2511_0702_01_10:
When you’re new to something, things may not go
the way you want them to at first...
ch0269_00_ayumi/2511_0702_02_10:
But I want to take it slow and enjoy everything at
my own pace!
ch0269_00_ayumi/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning! I was just out on a morning walk
with my Pokémon!
ch0269_00_ayumi/3003_0701_01_10:
Having lunch outdoors under a clear sky makes
food taste so good!
ch0269_00_ayumi/3005_0701_01_10:
*yawn* I walked so much today, so I think I’ll
sleep well tonight...
